title: Firefox Taskbar Icon requires two single clicks to open
content:
Hello there,

The Firefox Browser Icon that is on the taskbar requires two clicks to open the browser for the first time.

So when I single click the browser icon on the taskbar it doesn't open, so I need to click the icon again to open it. Its not that I need to double click it its just that every single time I need to click once then click it again to actually open the browser

Is there a way to fix this issue please?
creator: matthewdexter777

title: I can't log on to Gmail or anything google
content:
when I try to log on to google or Gmail I keep getting this: I can't get past this


Google Something went wrong Sorry, something went wrong there. Try again.

I can log on using other browsers.
creator: waynedex1

title: I use Mendeley Reference manager in Firefox.  It used to work OK.  Now I get a message "Firefox blocks extensions running on PDF files".  This is just what Mendeley does.  How do I get Firefox to allow this to happen again?
content: I use Mendeley Reference manager in Firefox. It used to work OK. Now I get a message "Firefox blocks extensions running on PDF files". This is just what Mendeley does. How do I get Firefox to allow this to happen again?
creator: rjhnatiuk

title: data sync empty
content: After the update I found that passwords were deleted and browsing history in a way that tried all the solutions did not work. To find these synced files? And how do I get it back to the Browser? The sync list is currently empty.
creator: jofiisex
